tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE lobbying_activities (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  lobbyist_name VARCHAR(255),
  organization VARCHAR(255),
  activity_date DATE,
  interaction_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE lobbyists (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    organization_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (organization_id) REFERENCES lobbying_organizations (id)
);

CREATE TABLE lobbying_activities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_date DATE,
    description TEXT,
    lobbyist_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (lobbyist_id) REFERENCES lobbyists (id)
);

CREATE TABLE lobbying_activities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    lobbyist_name VARCHAR(255),
    organization VARCHAR(255),
    activity_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    contact_person VARCHAR(255),
    interaction_type VARCHAR(255),
    outcome TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE lobbying_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_type TEXT,
    lobby_date DATE,
    lobbyist_id INT,
    purpose TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_id INT,
    lobbyist_id INT,
    contact_person TEXT,
    details TEXT
);
